item.title: How do i make you need level 90 cooking to cook manta rays?
item.dc:creator: @Prima Prima
item.description:
@Prima wrote:

if (useItemID == 389 && atObjectID == 4172) { // cooking mantas if (playerLevel[7] >= 90) { setAnimation(883); deleteItem(389, getItemSlot(389), 1); addItem(391, 1); addSkillXP(300 * playerLevel[7], 7); sendMessage("You cook a good juicy manta ray."); } else { sendMessage("You need a cooking level of 90 to cook Manta Rays!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make you need level 90 cooking to cook manta rays?
item.dc:creator: @gang02 gang02
item.description:
@gang02 wrote:

How do i make you need level 90 cooking to cook manta rays?

I want it so you need to be level 90 cooking to cook a raw manta ray.
This is the code below if it helps im not sure.

          ~ Code ~

       } else if (useItemID == 389 && atObjectID == 4172) // cooking mantas
        {
            setAnimation(883);
            deleteItem(389, getItemSlot(389), 1);
            addItem(391, 1);
            addSkillXP(300 * playerLevel[7], 7);
            sendMessage("You cook a good juicy manta ray.");

Please edit that code so it makes you need 90 cooking to cook a raw manta and then put the code in your reply!
